KB's Northern Smock & Kente

Description

KB's Northern Smocks and Kente provides quaslity and yet affordable smocks and kente across the country.We offer nothing but the best hand woven designs from the Northern.


Ever wondered where to get your affordable,quality kente and smock wears, we are here to serve you.


We deal in men,women and kids wear at affordable prices and also deliver at your doorsteps.
